The next one, is 512.
Let's see both cases with the details

8 + 1 = 9 and 9^(2) = 81

512 = 5 + 1 + 2 = 8 and 8^(3) = 512

The cases we presented above means that

power_sumDigTerm(1) == 81

power_sumDigTerm(2) == 512
